name: player_uiconf
title: Player UI conf
summary: Learn how to get and update player configuration

steps.title: Select a player
steps.description: Choose a player to view its configuration

steps.title: Updating the UI conf
steps.description: You can use the form below to add, change or remove functionality from your player.

codeSnippet.node:
<lucy include="ModifyUIconfForm"></lucy>
<script>
  $('#ModifyUIconfForm').submit(function() {
    var data = $(this).serialize();
    $.ajax({
      url: '/ModifyUIconf',
      type: 'POST',
      data: data,
      contentType: 'application/x-www-form-urlencoded',
      cache: false,
      processData: false,
      success: function (data, textStatus, jqXHR) {
        $('.container').html(data);
      }
    });
    return false;
  })
</script>
